gig.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a performance by a musician or a group of musicians playing modern popular music or jazz, or a performance by a comedian
gig.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: The band are doing a gig in Sheffield on Nov 12.
gig.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a job, especially one that does not last for a long time
gig.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: That's a nice gig if you can get it!
gig.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to give a performance of modern popular music or jazz
gig.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: a job, especially one that does not last for a long time
gig.translation[2].definitions[0].exampl: Working for a TV show is a pretty good gig.
